exceptions.tactic: intros m z t H1 H2 H3 H4.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros m z t H1 H2 H3 H4. split. - intros [i [j [H5 [H6 H7]]]]. split. + split. * apply H2. * exists j. split. { apply H7. } { apply H6. } + unfold expo1 in H7. destruct H7 as [j [H7 H8]]. unfold between in H3. apply (proj1 (between_expo m z z t H1 H2 H3)). split. * apply H5. * apply (expo_expo1 m z t H1 H2). exists j. split. { apply H7. } { apply H8. } - intros [[H5 H6] [j [H7 H8]]]. split. + apply H2. + exists i, j. split. * apply H8. * split. { apply H7. } { apply H6. }
